display_long_description:
# Dread Or Dead
Crawl, hide, survive.

**Gameplay:**

In this game, you play as a **mole**. When the gameplay starts, you become either a **Survivor** or a **Monster**.

As a survivor, you mine ores around the map, form teams with people, watch out, and survive the Monster. 

As the Monster, you should kill all the players on the map. The more you kill - the more you earn.
[media]

At the start, you are given a **Pickaxe** to mine ores. **The more you mine - the more you get paid in Ores.** You can spend Ores on equipment or accessories in the **Shop** map.
[media]

You are able to use the **environment** around you to your advantage that include:
- Minecarts
- Elevators
- Doors
- Tunnels system
[media]

# Dread Or Dead
Crawl, hide, survive.

**Gameplay:**

In this game, you play as a **mole**. When the gameplay starts, you become either a **Survivor** or a **Monster**.

As a survivor, you mine ores around the map, form teams with people, watch out, and survive the Monster. 

As the Monster, you should kill all the players on the map. The more you kill - the more you earn.
